dialogue.String: The order has been given by your party leader to enter  �[Everbloom Hollow/the Ruhotz Silvermines/Ghoyu's Reverie].�
What are you doing here? This is no place for civilians.1�
Ahhh, so you're military tactician who who drew up the plans for this latest supply mission.Why don't we ask one of the men how its going, shall we?1�
What are you doing here? This is no place for civilians.1�
Ahhh, so you're military tactician who who drew up the plans for this latest supply mission.Why don't we ask one of the men how its going, shall we?1�
What are you doing here? This is no place for civilians.1�
Ahhh, so you're military tactician who who drew up the plans for this latest supply mission.Why don't we ask one of the men how its going, shall we?1�
What are you doing here? This is no place for civilians.1�
Greetings. I am 	 of the San d'Orian Provincial Knights.1�
Greetings. I am 	 of the Bastokan Legion.1�
Greetings. I am 	 of the Federation of Windurst.1�
Greetings. I am 	, Campaign Arbiter for the Allied Forces.1�
What can I help you with?Nothing.Performance assessment.New Allied Tags.Temporary items.Union registration.Teleportation.Information on the Allied Campaign.1�
You've already undergone an evaluation for this battle, or had you forgotten?As much as I'd like to, I'm forbidden from providing you with a new set of Allied Taegs until the next battle begins.1�

I am sorry,  , but your campaign medal has expired. I cannot issue tags to anyone not authorized by the Allied Forces. Return to your nation's capital and speak with a Campaign Evaluation Official.1�

I am sorry,  , but your campaign medal has expired. I cannot issue tags to anyone not authorized by the Allied Forces. Return to your nation's capital and speak with a Campaign Evaluation Official.1�
Register for a union?No.Yes.1�
What will you do?Nothing.Transfer to another union.Resign union membership.1�

Your steadfast efforts have earned you a claim to share in your union's spoils of war.By  �[transferring to another union/resigning from your union], you will relinquish this right.It is not my place to question your decision, but I suggest you pay the matter due heed.1�
�[Transfer unions/Resign from your current union]?No.Yes.1�

Your steadfast efforts have earned you a claim to share in your union's spoils of war.By  �[transferring to another union/resigning from your union], you will relinquish this right.It is not my place to question your decision, but I suggest you pay the matter due heed.1�
�[Transfer unions/Resign from your current union]?No.Yes.1�

I am afraid that all unions are currently at their maximum enrollment, and unable to accept new recruits.For better or for worse, though, I suspect it shall not be long before we are in need of some new blood.Such is the nature of war...1�

Register for which union?None.Adder Union (
� ��[member/members]).Bison Union (
 �[member/members]).Coyote Union (
 �[member/members]).Dhole Union (
 �[member/members]).Eland Union (
 �[member/members]).1�
Oh my Gob! You're one of those adventurerurers, aren't ya?You got nothin' on me, �[man./lady.] I was just mindin' my own businesesess, lookin' for junk an' stuff.1�
Hey, watch out. You don't wanna fight me. I'll turn you into meat jerky!Wait, how about you and me be friends instead? Sound good?1�
I travel all over the world and hear lots of differererent stories. I even hear your stories. I can tell you one, if you want.1�
Do you want to hear a story?No, thank you.Let's hear one.1�
What story would you like to be told?On second thought, maybe later.Red recommendation letter.In a Haze of Glory(pt.1).In a Haze of Glory(pt.2).In a Haze of Glory(pt.3).1�
Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.1�
If it is not the ��adventurer��! Had you a change of heart, eh?1�
Have I piqued your interest?Yes!No.1�
Take that 3���� to the San d'Orian capital and present it to Captain Mainchelite.1�
If my memory serves me well, I seem to recall an initiation trial was required of all new recruits. Oh, but you need worry not--the assessment was nothing more than formality.1�
Well, congratulations, recruit! I look forward to hearing the bards sing of your heroic deeds!1�
Take care, as the journey to the capital will not be an easy one.1�
May the divine light of the Goddess guide you.1�
No unauthorized personnel are permit--Oh, it's you again...1�
What? Ya want something?1�
Lemme guess, you wanna get your hands on 6����. Am I right?1�
Is he right?Yes, that's exactly what I want.Actually, no.1�
Fine, I'll see what I can do. Gimme a minute.1�
Well then, stop bothering me! You got no idea what it's like to be this busy.1�
That figures. Looks like we're plumb outta maps.1�
Of all the times...1�
Well, since you're here, I may as well get some use outta ya.1�
Oh, don't gimme that look. Get over yourself. I'll go and get ya your map while you're keeping busy.1�
Ya see, a while ago I made the mistake of putting 6���� in the Firesand Storeroom.1�
I mean, come on. "Firesand" and "Firepower." How am I not supposed to get those mixed up?1�
So look, just go get that and bring it back here for me. And that's it.1�
...What? I said that's it. Go fetch me the 3���� out of the Firesand Storeroom.1�
You get your hands on that 3���� from the Firesand Storeroom yet? I'll have your map ready by the time you bring it back.1�
Hey, that's the stuff! The 3����, just like I asked. You're alright...for an adventurer.1�
I know I asked you to help me, but truth be told...1�
I checked everywhere I could think of and just couldn't find you a map.1�
...Oh, wait!1�
Rarcasmeault tears the "Keep Away From Fire!" sign from the case.�
...Found one.1�
Heh, guess I had one after all.Here you go, your very own 3����.1�
A crude map is drawn on the backside of the sign.� 
Heh, who woulda thought, eh?It was here the whole time. Guess I just forgot sticking it on there.Well, say ��thank you.��1�
A number of cases are lined up on the table here.1�
A sign reading "Keep Away From Fire!" is affixed to the case.�
Leave the incinerator?Yes.No.1�
I am a friar from the San d'Orian Cathedral.1�

I was journeying on my pilgrimage when I inadvertently wandered into the front line of the beasthorde offensive. Fortunately, the Royal Knights discovered me first, and took me into their custody. Even though I am thankful, I wish the knights would grant me leave to continue my journey.1�
I am a friar from the San d'Orian Cathedral.1�

I was journeying on my pilgrimage when I inadvertently wandered into the front line of the beasthorde offensive. Fortunately, the Royal Knights discovered me first, and took me into their custody. Even though I am thankful, I wish the knights would grant me leave to continue my journey.1�
Would you perhaps be a soldier of the Allied Forces? I am in desperate need of your assistance. I beg you, please hear me out.1�

It is a rather embarrassing story... When I was attacked by monsters in Grauberg, in my blind panic I threw whatever was on hand in an attempt to drive away the beasts. It was too late when I realized I had hurled a package of great import, entrusted to me from the Cathedral, straight into the river. I would have retrieved it myself, but I was...uh...distracted.1�
If you were to chance upon an ornate package while traveling through Grauberg, could you please bring it back to me?1�
I pray that it has not been washed downstream. I would be indebted if you could locate the package...and not spread the tale of my ��exploits.��1�
If you were to chance upon an ornate package while traveling through Grauberg, could you please bring it back to me?1�
I pray that it has not been washed downstream. I would be indebted if you could locate the package...and not spread the tale of my ��exploits.��1�
Why, be that not the 3����? That is indeed the item I hurled--I mean, dropped!1�
I thank you from the bottom of my heart. The package contains tools such as paint, to be used to repair the Goddess's image should she be damaged during the course of the war.1�
This is not much, but please accept it. This white magic will allow the user to teleport straight to the battlefield within the blink of an eye.1�
It pains me to wonder what may have become of the cathedral...O merciful Altana! Please grant us your divine protection!1�
Your memory is engraved with an image of your surroundings and the fragrance of flowers...�
Hey, you're in the way.We fortifyin' this here wall to withstand the beastmen's siege turrets.So how's about just gettin' outta here before you get hurt.1�
Unless you're willin' to wipe that helpless look off your face and lend us a hand.That'd be a different story.1�
Hey, you're in the way.We fortifyin' this here wall to withstand the beastmen's siege turrets.So how's about just gettin' outta here before you get hurt.1�
Unless you're willin' to wipe that helpless look off your face and lend us a hand.That'd be a different story.1�
Hey, you're in the way.We fortifyin' this here wall to withstand the beastmen's siege turrets.So how's about just gettin' outta here before you get hurt.1�
Unless you're willin' to wipe that helpless look off your face and lend us a hand.That'd be a different story.1�
Assist with the fortifications?Show them how it's done!Refuse to help.Ask for an explanation.1�
Alright! That's the spirit!Let's get a move on, then.1�
Alright! That's the spirit!Let's get a move on, then.1�
Alright! That's the spirit!Let's get a move on, then.1�

Like I said, in preparation for an enemy assault, we're workin' to fortify these defensive barriers.If you're willin', I'd like to place you in charge of managin' these here craftsmen as they go about it.1�

To be more precise, once you get to each craftsman's position, you have to tell 'em exactly what I'm about to tell you.Namely, what type of crystal they need to be usin'. That's all there is to it.1�
The young Elvaan wearin' the red hat is a blacksmith.Make sure he's using fire crystals.1�
The adorable little Tarutaru with the blonde braids is laying plaster.Gonna have to get her on some ice crystals.1�
The Hume lady is a stonemason, and a darn good one.She's gonna be needin' wind crystals.1�
That old coot of an Elvaan with the huge axe strapped across his back is a carpenter.Famous 'round these parts. Make sure you get him workin' with earth crystals.1�
May not look it, but the Mithra with the black kerchief wrapped 'round her noggin is an architect.She's gonna need her lightning crystals.1�
That sprat of a Tarutaru wearin' the blue getup's a handy lil' plumber.Surin' he'll be wantin' his water crystals, no doubt.1�
The good-looking fella in all white does scaffoldin'. Young Hume lad.See to it he's usin' light crystals.1�
The lady Elvaan's a painter. Handles a brush like nobody I never seen.Need dark crystals in that line of work.And that's it.1�
Ahhh, one more thing.If you're too late issuin' your orders, they're liable to up and leave their posts.So be right, and be quick.1�

Like I said, in preparation for an enemy assault, we're workin' to fortify these defensive barriers.If you're willin', I'd like to place you in charge of managin' these here craftsmen as they go about it.1�

What?A group of child knights, you say?1�
Hmm...I know not of the ones you seek, but there are indeed squires, refugees, and even children who have taken residence within this stronghold since the outbreak of the war.1�
Now, have you some manner of documentation identifying you as the guardian of these children?1�
Oh? We've met previously, have we not?1�
Yes, I remember now--you are  .1�
I beg your pardon, Sir Vailanice. Is this person, too, a member of your extended family?1�
Well...in a sense, yes.1�

You must excuse my intrusion the other day.If you'll allow me to properly introduce myself, I am Vailanice of the Knights of the Iron Ram. I've the honor of leading a modest number of knights in the regiment.1�
This would be our first time trading words in earnest, is it not? Truth be told, I've already been privileged with the knowledge of your many exploits.1�
Courtesy of these young knights, here.1�
How very unlike you to arrive last of all.1�
But, as captain, I appreciate your being here just the same.1�
You'll be pleased to hear that we, the Knights of the Swiftwing Griffin, have been entrusted with a role of great import: the defense of the northeastern quadrant of the Garlaige Citadel!1�
A rather intriguing development...How does cleaning duty suddenly become defense, pray tell?1�
Such minor details matter not.Any Orcish force that has the gall to invade the citadel will have to answer to the Swiftwing Griffins!1�
Yeah!1�
Hahaha, spoken like a true knight. The visual integrity of the citadel's northeast is in your hands, fearless soldiers.1�
Sir Vailanice, if I could be forgiven for my boldness...1�
Are there not more suitable playgrounds than here for the children?1�

Your concern is appreciated, Diordinne, but a little leeway would be in order, I should think. After all, thanks to their tireless effort, the provisions storehouse is now free of rats and other undesirables.1�
That, I deny not, but...1�
<Pant, pant>...S-Sir Vailanice! We have an emergency! Th-the enemy...!1�
Calm down, man.Tell me what's happened.1�
Sir! We're under attack!All kitchen personnel have fallen victim--1�
Kitchen personnel, you say?But, what business have they to wander without the citadel?1�
Sir, all were confirmed to have perished in the kitchen where they stood!1�
You'll be pleased to hear that we, the Knights of the Swiftwing Griffin, have been entrusted with a role of great import: the defense of the northeastern quadrant of the Garlaige Citadel!1�
Could this be the handiwork of Beastman Confederate elite?1�
Goblins...Bounty hunters, I'm willing to wager. We must get to the bottom of this.1�
Thianond, pray lead the way.1�
Diordinne, you are to relay the news of this disturbing development to all commanding officers and their regiments.1�
At once, sir.And...I mean not to unnerve you, sir, but I sense an ill foreboding. Please, take all care.1�
Thank you, Diordinne. You also.1�
Cyra...nuce.The northeastern quadrant--is it not in the jurisdiction of the Swiftwing Griffins?1�

After careful deliberation, our military strategists have discerned that the Beastman Confederate's main target is Jeuno.Not that any of us think they will be undertaking any form of structured offensive...1�
Other units should be in possession of a spare key. I will have one brought here presently, so come and collect it from me in a short while.1�
The spare key, you say? The intruders have cut off many of the passageways within the citadel, so it will take some time yet. Have patience.1�
Take this spare key to the number eight shelter. Be careful not to misplace it again.1�
The number eight shelter is accessible via a secret entrance at H-9 on your map.1�
San d'Oria Nation Quest 6: Follow B.1�
Hey, hey, hey! You can't be here!How did you get past the guards?1�
This citadel houses an enormous deposit of firesand. By using it to blast--wait. Who are you!?If you are not authorized to be here then you must leave at once!1�
Have you heard tell of the Gigas invasion of Vunkerl Inlet?1�
Stories tell of their monstrous strength, effortlessly tossing about boulders even larger than themselves.1�
...That reminds me, I haven't acquried a map of Vunkerl Inlet myself.I must go and retrieve one from the Munitions Storeroom.1�
The Firesand Storeroom lies beyond this gate.But be warned, adventurer. The way is rife with danger. Proceed at your own peril.1�
The opening mechanism for the door is out of order.You won't be able to open it for now.1�

Have you seen any of the accursed ��maws,�� as they are being called? The apparitions floating about with those gaping jowls. I heard that in Jeuno they are trying desperately to figure out exactly what they are.1�
Beastman Confederate or not, if they are going to attack, I wish they would just hurry up and get it over with!I'm sick of being afraid and waiting... I just want it all to be over!1�
Pull yourself together, man! You think you're the only one who's scared? I'm terrified!But if we give in to that fear and run now, we'll have no place left to go!1�

I think I'd like to open a restaurant if I ever live to see the end of this war.You may not be able to tell by looking at me now, but I used to train under a real chef.If you ever get the chance, you should try one of my dishes.1�
At the open-sea battle of Zafmlug, the combined naval armada of Tavnazia and Bastok prevented the landfall of the gigas forces.A grand naval battle for the history books, by any reckoning!1�

The Banishing Gates are currently undergoing repairs.Apparently the opening and closing mechanism was too delicate...Luckily, it started malfunctioning in the closed position. Surely a blessing from Altana herself.1�
What?A group of child knights, you say?1�
Hmm...I know not of the ones you seek, but there are indeed squires, refugees, and even children who have taken residence within this stronghold since the outbreak of the war.1�
Now, have you some manner of documentation identifying you as the guardian of these children?1�
